body.p: Plugin command to display the supported Backup Storage Plugin API version.

section.title: Description
section.p: gpbackup and gprestore invoke the plugin_api_version plugin command before a backup or restore operation to determine Backup Storage Plugin API version compatibility.

section.title: Return Value
section.p: The plugin_api_version command must return the Backup Storage Plugin API version number supported by the storage plugin, "0.3.0".
